text: James M. McCoy (July 30, 1930 â€“ July 13, 2022) was an American Air Force officer. He was the sixth Chief Master Sergeant of the Air Force from 1979 to 1981. McCoy was born in Creston, Iowa and was raised in Atchison, Kansas. He served during the Vietnam War. McCoy died on July 13, 2022 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:People from Creston, Iowa Category:People from Atchison, Kansas Category:Military people from Kansas
title: James M. McCoy
